content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, two vectors <math alttext="open angle brackets 3 comma 2 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open angle brackets 3 over 2 comma 5 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> span a parallelogram. Which of the following gives the area of that parallelogram, in square units?

choices.label: <math alttext="open vertical bar open parentheses 3 close parentheses open parentheses 2 close parentheses minus open parentheses 3 over 2 close parentheses open parentheses 5 close parentheses close vertical bar"><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open vertical bar open parentheses 3 close parentheses open parentheses 3 over 2 close parentheses minus open parentheses 2 close parentheses open parentheses 5 close parentheses close vertical bar"><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open vertical bar open parentheses 3 close parentheses open parentheses 5 close parentheses minus open parentheses 3 over 2 close parentheses open parentheses 2 close parentheses close vertical bar"><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open vertical bar open parentheses 3 close parentheses open parentheses 3 over 2 close parentheses plus open parentheses 2 close parentheses open parentheses 5 close parentheses close vertical bar"><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open vertical bar open parentheses 3 close parentheses open parentheses 5 close parentheses minus open parentheses 3 over 2 close parentheses open parentheses 2 close parentheses close vertical bar"><mfenced close="|" open="|"><mrow><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mn>2</mn></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>
